title: Overlay: deduplicate ball overlays per frame window
scope: Reduce filter size and improve readability by deduplicating multiple ball present records that map to the same frame window.
Keep deterministic selection (highest confidence wins; stable tie-break).
acceptance: For multiple eligible ball records mapping to the same frame window, only one overlay is emitted (deterministic selection).

deliverables.title: Deduplication logic + tests
acceptance: Deterministic overlay filter includes one draw op pair per frame window.
